titleInfo.title: Interior of The Meyer Store in Fort Collins

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#741 Meyer Store in Ft. Collins''. On back of the photograph: ''The Meyer Store Ft. Collins #741''.

mods.abstract: Interior of Sam Meyer's Store in Fort Collins, Colorado. There are a number of unidentified people who appear to be shopping for clothing throughout the store.
